title: Mandrake the Magician. Vol. 01
creator_credit: Columbia Pictures, Norman Deming and Sam Nelson
brief_description: The comics’ crimefighting prestidigitator comes to the screen in this thrill-laden serial, as Mandrake (Warren Hull) and his African sidekick Lothar (Al Kikume) help a noted scientist protect his radium-energy machine from a sinister criminal genius known as the Wasp. Doris Weston, Forbes Murray co-star.
